participant_1.background:
I like to do things that take my mind off the past.
I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing.
I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.
i like to eat the skin of the apple.
I sometimes worry about my cats' safety when I'm on tour.

i am a classicly trained chef.
i play bass.
My sister is a teacher, and my niece and nephew are still in school.
I've been able to spend more time outdoors with my family since joining the hiking group.

content.text: I love the outdoors! Do you like to spend time in nature?
Yes, I love being outdoors. I joined a hiking group a few months ago and have been able to spend more time with my family. We go hiking together every weekend now.
That's awesome! I like to go for walks in the woods near my house. I love listening to the birds and the sounds of nature.
I love hearing the birds too. It's so peaceful.
What's your favorite thing to do outside?
I love to cook outside. I'm a classically trained chef, and I love to experiment with different flavors and ingredients.
That's awesome! I love to cook too, but I'm not as good as you are!
Well, you're in luck! I love to teach people how to cook.
Oh, that would be great! I'd love to learn how to cook some new dishes.
Great! I'm free this weekend if you want to come over and I can show you a few things.
That sounds great! I'll bring some ingredients.
